author: eli
msg: MAPREDUCE-2760. mapreduce.jobtracker.split.metainfo.maxsize typoed in mapred-default.xml. Contributed by Todd Lipcon

author: hboutemy
msg: added properties in file path replacement

author: sergeyb
msg: [CXF-3703] Minor update to WebClient to avoid overriding Content-Type for GET requests

author: psteitz
msg: * Added RandomGeneratorAbstractTest collecting stock tests for RandomGenerator
implementations and running RandomDataTest test cases using RandomDataImpls
* Added BitsStreamGeneratorTest extending RandomGeneratorAbstractTest to test
* Changed Mersenne and Well generator tests to extend RandomGeneratorAbstractTest.
* Improved test coverage (discovering MATH-640) of AbstractRandomGeneratorTest
by making this class extend RandomGeneratorAbstractTest.
All new tests use fixed seeds.

author: aconway
msg: NO-JIRA: Minor improvements to test scripts.
allhosts: added -X option for running X clients.
qpid-cpp-benchmark: accept comma or space-separated lists for --client-host and --broker.
